trans-unit.source: Handles the painting functionality for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects, using system colors and a flat visual style.
trans-unit.target: Manipula a funcionalidade de pintura em objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />, usando as cores do sistema e um estilo de visual plano.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> applies system colors and a flat visual style to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> aplica-se as cores do sistema e um estilo visual simples para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> aplicativos.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> applies a palette of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> and visual styles, if visual styles are enabled for the application.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> aplica uma paleta de <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors> e estilos visuais, caso esses estilos estejam habilitados para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.
